content.text: Match ends, SV Werder Bremen 3, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, SV Werder Bremen 3, Chelsea 0.
Goal!  SV Werder Bremen 3, Chelsea 0. Felix Kroos (SV Werder Bremen) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Nathan Aké (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Nathan Aké (Chelsea) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty SV Werder Bremen. Nils Petersen draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Petr Cech.
Corner,  SV Werder Bremen. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Assani Lukimya.
Substitution, Chelsea. Lewis Baker replaces John Terry.
Substitution, SV Werder Bremen. Levent Aycicek replaces Santiago García.
Substitution, SV Werder Bremen. Martin Kobylanski replaces Zlatko Junuzovic.
Substitution, SV Werder Bremen. Oliver Hüsing replaces Luca Caldirola.
Attempt missed. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Theodor Gebre Selassie (SV Werder Bremen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nathan Aké (Chelsea).

Substitution, Chelsea. Jeremie Boga replaces César Azpilicueta.
